TopicTitle: M26 Pershing and T26E4 Super Pershing Tank Replicas

Articles.Content:
Somehow I forgot to release these, even though they're some of my favorite replicas. Both have detachable turrets, and drive rather smoothly. Stock craft, photos have been edited to give them tinting and looks.

M26: https://www.mediafire.com/?7fzqv5b8a6jq47n

T26E4:https://www.mediafire.com/?7fzqv5b8a6jq47n

Edited March 26, 2016 by zekes

Somehow I forgot to release these, even though they're some of my favorite replicas. Both have detachable turrets, and drive rather smoothly. Stock craft, photos have been edited to give them tinting and looks.

I feel as though right as I posted this on your thread for Zokesia, you posted your own versions of these. Very nice replica's indeed. I presume I will delete the cromwell and Pershing from my cue so there isn't no competition or anything of that sort.
